tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Tough Grader (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: Took as a gened, was a little hard for an entry-level class with a lot of memorization, but overall interesting. Attendance is only mandatory for weekly labs. Her slides are good, but she doesn\'t put them online, so you have to go to lecture. Grade is composed of weekly labs, midterm, 2 shorts papers, & final. Interesting prof & passionate.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Tough Grader (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)

comments: By far worst teacher I\'ve had. She is very nice but makes it so you have to go to every class because she does not post the powerpoint online. She makes grading incredibly hard and requires you to do 2 big projects for her that are very hard. Just do not take this class

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Tough Grader (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very unorganized... lectures are all over the place, knows little to nothing about the topic of Forensic Science, relates EVERYTHING to Anthropology and Primates. Needs constant assistance from other professors on lab prep and instruction. Zero help when asking for guidance in labs. Quiz question are not found in the readings or notes as stated

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Tough Grader (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TEST HEAVY  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Don\'t take this class with her! Her assigned textbook is useless for tests and the study guides she gives barely tell anything about the test. The midterm average was ridiculously low and she called a 1 point scale generous -- 89 is an A- whoa thats crazy. Most of the TAs aren\'t good, so do yourself a favor and save your GPA and take another class.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Tough Grader (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: If you don\'t have to take this class... DON\'T! Especially if you aren\'t into biology or the sciences in general. The course focuses on primates. Sounds interesting and it is. But the midterm and final are SUPER HARD. She tests you on stuff never discussed in class or the book. Discussion is 30% of grade and TA\'s suck soooo... Overall disapointed

comments: This is by far one of the worst classes and professors ever. The exams are extremely hard and she does not post any of her lecture material online, so if you skip/miss class you\'re out of luck. Do not recommend at all

comments: It should have been and easy and really pleasing class. The content is really interesting but the professor doens\'t follow the sillabus (more work than it says there) neither the textbook (she teaches the oposite theories). She doesn\'t give the power points, so you have to go there. Well, Worst teacher ever! Don\'t get this class :(
